args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Open mapping theorem for holomorphic functions on subsets of the complex plane. -/
theorem open_mapping_theorem {U : Set ℂ} (hU : IsOpen U) (hUconn : IsConnected U)
  {f : ℂ → ℂ} (hf : IsHolomorphicOn f U) (hfnc : ¬ IsConstantOn U f) : IsOpen (f '' U) := by sorry

/-- Local injectivity: if the derivative at p is nonzero then f is locally injective. -/
theorem locally_injective_of_deriv_ne_zero {U : Set ℂ} {f : ℂ → ℂ} {p : ℂ}
  (hU : IsOpen U) (hf : IsHolomorphicOn f U) (hp : p ∈ U) (hder : (deriv f) p ≠ 0) :
  ∃ V, IsOpen V ∧ p ∈ V ∧ V ⊆ U ∧ InjOn f V := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Open mapping theorem (translated statement). -/
theorem open_mapping_theorem {U : Set ℂ} (hU : IsOpen U) (hUconn : Prop)
  {f : ℂ → ℂ} (hf : Prop) (hfnc : Prop) : IsOpen (f '' U) := by sorry

/-- Local injectivity at points with nonzero derivative (translated statement). -/
theorem locally_injective_of_deriv_ne_zero {U : Set ℂ} {f : ℂ → ℂ} {p : ℂ}
  (hU : IsOpen U) (hf : Prop) (hp : p ∈ U) (hder : Prop) :
  ∃ V : Set ℂ, IsOpen V ∧ p ∈ V ∧ V ⊆ U ∧ (∀ x y, x ∈ V → y ∈ V → f x = f y → x = y) := by sorry
